Name: Princess Mary's Pride
Ingredients: 45 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
Instructions: STIR (or shake) all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Review: Apple brandy to the fore, followed by aromatised wine.
History: Adapted from a recipe created by Harry Craddock on 28th February 1922 to celebrate the wedding of H.R.H. Princess Mary, and published in his 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book where he calls for this cocktail to be shaken rather than stirred.
Nutrition: One serving of Princess Mary's Pride contains 163 calories
